## Scraping Data

```{r}
library(rvest)

topGrossingLink <- "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_highest-grossing_horror_films"

horrorMovies <- read_html(topGrossingLink) %>% 
  html_table(fill = TRUE) %>% 
  `[[`(1)

knitr::kable(horrorMovies)
```
